comment._content: I believe that this is a photo of a Mines Rescue station for the Cessnock Coal field

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: Thanks for your comment, barnsey9. We believe this might be the South Mailtand Mines Rescue Station as it was grouped together with two other images showing a building called the "South Maitland Mines Rescue Station" Here is a link to one of the images www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/4036228222/
